mean_en: a structure (such as a house, hospital, school, etc.) with a roof and walls that is used as a place for people to live, work, do activities, store things, etc.
word_etyma: build建造+ing某种行为的产物→建筑物
sentence: In this modern city center, every building looks the same.
sentence_trans: 在这座现代化城市中心，每栋建筑看起来都一样。
